instruction.instructions: 1) Make egg salad by chopping the hard boiled eggs and mixing in a bowl with mayonnaise, Dijon
2) Halve the rolls and spread one half with Dijon, the other half with mayonnaise
3) Sprinkle the mayonnaise-spread half with salt and pepper
4) Lay cheese and ham on the mustard half; lay avocado, onion slices, tomato slices, egg salad, and lettuce on the other half

ingredients.value: whole Kaiser Rolls Or Other Bread
